mapper.sql: FID, FCREATORID, FCREATETIME, FLASTUPDATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FCONTROLUNITID, FNUMBER, FBIZDATE, FHANDLERID, FDESCRIPTION, FHASEFFECTED, FAUDITORID, FSOURCEBILLID, FSOURCEFUNCTION, FFIVOUCHERED, CFDESIGNNUMBERID, CFORGUNITID, CFSHCHANLINEID, CFZHUSHEID, CFFIELD, CFEARNUMBERID, CFGENETICSID, CFCOLLECTORID, CFCOLLECTIONTIME, CFDAYS, CFAUDITUSERID, CFIFAUDITING, CFWEEKHAO, CFISDETECTED
mapper.select: SELECT t.CFCOLLECTIONTIME beforeDate FROM CT_PIG_COLLECTIONRECORD t WHERE t.CFEARNUMBERID = #{earNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ROWNUM = 1 ORDER BY t.CFCOLLECTIONTIME DESC

SELECT * FROM CT_PIG_COLLECTIONRECORD c LEFT JOIN (select to_char (sysdate- level + 1, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') today FROM DUAL connect BY LEVEL <= 7) days on days.today = c.FCREATETIME WHERE c.CFORGUNITID = #{storageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY c.FCREATETIME
select c.CFIFAUDITING from CT_PIG_COLLECTIONRECORD c where c.FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into CT_PIG_COLLECTIONRECORD (FCREATORID, FCREATETIME, FLASTUPDATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FCONTROLUNITID, FNUMBER, FBIZDATE, FHANDLERID, FDESCRIPTION, FHASEFFECTED, FAUDITORID, FSOURCEBILLID, FSOURCEFUNCTION, FFIVOUCHERED, CFDESIGNNUMBERID, CFORGUNITID, CFSHCHANLINEID, CFZHUSHEID, CFFIELD, CFEARNUMBERID, CFGENETICSID, CFCOLLECTORID, CFCOLLECTIONTIME, CFDAYS, CFAUDITUSERID, CFIFAUDITING, CFWEEKHAO, CFISDETECTED) values (#{fcreatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fcontrolunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fhandlerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fhaseffected,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fauditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsourcebillid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsourcefunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ffivouchered,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cfdesignnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cforgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfshchanlineid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfzhusheid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cffield,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfearnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfgeneticsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfcollectorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfcollectiontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cfdays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cfaudituserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfifauditing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cfweekhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cfisdetected,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

mapper.update:
update CT_PIG_COLLECTIONRECORD
FCREATORID = #{fcreatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTUPDATEUSERID = #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCONTROLUNITID = #{fcontrolunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FNUMBER = #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBIZDATE = #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FHANDLERID = #{fhandlerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDESCRIPTION = #{fdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FHASEFFECTED = #{fhaseffected,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FAUDITORID = #{fauditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FSOURCEBILLID = #{fsourcebillid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FSOURCEFUNCTION = #{fsourcefunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FFIVOUCHERED = #{ffivouchered,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CFDESIGNNUMBERID = #{cfdesignnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFORGUNITID = #{cforgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFSHCHANLINEID = #{cfshchanlineid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFZHUSHEID = #{cfzhusheid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFFIELD = #{cffield,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFEARNUMBERID = #{cfearnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFGENETICSID = #{cfgeneticsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFCOLLECTORID = #{cfcollectorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFCOLLECTIONTIME = #{cfcollectiontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CFDAYS = #{cfdays,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CFAUDITUSERID = #{cfaudituserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFIFAUDITING = #{cfifauditing,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CFWEEKHAO = #{cfweekhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CFISDETECTED = #{cfisdetected,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update CT_PIG_COLLECTIONRECORD set FCREATORID = #{fcreatorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLASTUPDATEUSERID = #{flastupdateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCONTROLUNITID = #{fcontrolunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FNUMBER = #{fnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBIZDATE = #{fbizdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FHANDLERID = #{fhandlerid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDESCRIPTION = #{fdescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FHASEFFECTED = #{fhaseffected,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FAUDITORID = #{fauditorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSOURCEBILLID = #{fsourcebillid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FSOURCEFUNCTION = #{fsourcefunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FFIVOUCHERED = #{ffivouchered,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CFDESIGNNUMBERID = #{cfdesignnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFORGUNITID = #{cforgunitid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFSHCHANLINEID = #{cfshchanlineid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFZHUSHEID = #{cfzhusheid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFFIELD = #{cffield,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFEARNUMBERID = #{cfearnumberid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFGENETICSID = #{cfgeneticsid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFCOLLECTORID = #{cfcollectorid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFCOLLECTIONTIME = #{cfcollectiontime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CFDAYS = #{cfdays,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CFAUDITUSERID = #{cfaudituserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFIFAUDITING = #{cfifauditing,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CFWEEKHAO = #{cfweekhao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFISDETECTED = #{cfisdetected,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update CT_PIG_COLLECTIONRECORD c set c.CFIFAUDITING = '1', c.CFAUDITUSERID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where c.FID = #{fid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
